gold.user: User requests to fetch details of a specific Connect App using its SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the Connect App in JSON format.

gold.user: User wants to update the configuration of a Connect App with new settings.
gold.ideal: Updates the Connect App and returns the updated details in JSON format.

gold.user: User intends to delete a specific Connect App identified by its SID.
gold.ideal: Confirms the deletion of the Connect App and returns a success message.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all Connect Apps associated with their account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of Connect Apps in JSON format, including their details.
